mapper.select: select max_last_rev_dt from public_srsnames fetch first 1 row only

select parm_cd "parm_cd", description "description", characteristicname "characteristicname", measureunitcode "measureunitcode", resultsamplefraction "resultsamplefraction", resulttemperaturebasis "resulttemperaturebasis", resultstatisticalbasis "resultstatisticalbasis", resulttimebasis "resulttimebasis", resultweightbasis "resultweightbasis", resultparticlesizebasis "resultparticlesizebasis", to_char(last_rev_dt, 'yyyy-mm-dd') "last_rev_dt" from public_srsnames order by 1
